title: Ep 81: Miranda Kerr of Kora Organics is a Magic Girl
itunes:title: Ep 81: Miranda Kerr of Kora Organics is a Magic Girl
itunes:subtitle: Miranda Kerr, supermodel and founder of Kora Organics, shares insightful tips for getting over grief and heartbreak, explains why “noninis” are the new martinis, and spills her best beauty secrets. We also discuss Iceland’s skin-softening (hair-ravagin...
description:
Miranda Kerr, supermodel and founder of Kora Organics, shares insightful tips for getting over grief and heartbreak, explains why “noninis” are the new martinis, and spills her best beauty secrets. We also discuss Iceland’s skin-softening (hair-ravaging) Blue Lagoon; the hottest hairstyle on Pinterest; and why rosacea is so prevalent right now (could an ingredient lurking in moisturizer be the cause?).

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
